title: The Kids Are Getting Their Covid-19 Vaccine, the Parents Are Buying Plane Tickets
sub_head: Some families plan to fly for the first time in more than a year around the holidays, while others are zeroing in on trips next spring or summer
body:
For some families eager to get their children vaccinated, holiday travel is back on—at least for now.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention on Tuesday recommended use of Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE ‘s Covid-19 vaccine in children as young as 5 years old, meaning young children could begin getting their first dose this week.
